text: Kauravi is a group of dialects of Jatri that originated in the city of kuru region, India. Nowadays it is spoken around India like Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Uttarakhand, Punjab and even in Karachi, Pakistan.https://books.google.com/books?id=FWNPUpuLav4C It is Sister dialect of Haryanvi.https://khadibolishabdkosh.com/ == References == Category:Languages of India Category:Languages of Pakistan Category:Indo-Aryan languages
title: Kauravi dialect
